title: For Buildings outside Slums -Every occupant of every building falling under a URC on the date of sanction of this Regulation (hereinafter referred to as the cut-off date), shall be eligible for rehabilitation and relocation under the Scheme, in accordance with the provisions of Regulation No
clause_text: For Buildings outside Slums -Every occupant of every building falling under a URC on the date of sanction of this Regulation (hereinafter referred to as the cut-off date), shall be eligible for rehabilitation and relocation under the Scheme, in accordance with the provisions of Regulation No.14.8.4 and 14.8.5, subject to the ineligibility criteria mentioned herein below.
section: Eligibility for Urban Renewal Cluster (URC) â€“
